text: Alberto Aleandro Uderzo (; ; 25 April 1927 - 24 March 2020),. known as Albert Uderzo, was a French comic book artist and scriptwriter. He was best known for his work on the Astérix series and also drew other comics such as Oumpah-pah, also in collaboration with René Goscinny. Uderzo died on 24 March 2020 of a heart attack in Neuilly-sur-Seine, France, aged 92. ==References== Category:1927 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:French artists
title: Albert Uderzo
